name: SPELLSWORN (itch)
description:
A unique blend of deck builder card game and a bullet hell!

A young witch is trying to escape the forest. Will she succeed?

* Collect powerful cards!

* Merge cards to increase their power!

* 4 Bosses!

* 3 Endings!

Keyboard only!

WASD / ARROW KEYS - Move, change selection.

X / SPACE - Interact, select.
